title: New York Magazine revives classified ads with a modern twist
description: My favorite black hole on the internet is Facebook Marketplace. As a lover of Stuff, I browse almost daily to see the things people in the greater Boston area want to part with. I love to look at the photos, analyze how they’re taken, zoom in on interesting tidbits in the background, all to send...
